title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 210-7.1 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 210-7.1 - Severability

State Regulations

Each section of this Part shall be deemed severable, and
in the event that any section of this Part is held to be invalid, the remainder
of this Part shall continue in full force and effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
210-7.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
